段: 一杯咖啡只有加添傷悲，因為欲分開下糖嘛袂甜。千言萬語只有保重兩字，因為我了解講愈濟話愈相思。啊！我對你的情我用行動來表示，啊！阮對你的愛相信先苦而後甜，希望天來保庇，希望你愛堅持，予咱早一日結連理。

chit8 poe ka-pi chi2-u7 ke-thinn siong-pi, in-ui7 beh hun-khui he7 thng5 ma7 boe7 tinn. chhian gian5 ban7 gu2 chi2-u7 po2-tiong7 nng7 ji7, in-ui7 goa2 liau2-kai2 kang2 lu2 choe7 oe7 lu2 siunn-si. ah! goa2 tui3 li2 e5 cheng5 goa2 eng7 heng5-tong7 lai5 piau2-si7, ah! gun2 tui3 li2 e5 ai3 siong-sin3 seng khou2 ji5-au7 tinn, hi-bong7 thinn lai5 po2-pi3, hi-bong7 li2 ai3 kian-chhi5, hou7 lan2 cha2 chit8 jit8 kat lian5-li2.
一杯咖啡只有加添傷悲，因為欲分開下糖嘛袂甜。千言萬語只有保重兩字，因為我了解講愈濟話愈相思。啊！我對你的情我用行動來表示，啊！阮對你的愛相信先苦而後甜，希望天來保庇，希望你愛堅持，予咱早一日結連理。

chit8 poe ka-pi chi2-u7 ke-thinn siong-pi, in-ui7 beh hun-khui he7 thng5 ma7 boe7 tinn. chhian gian5 ban7 gu2 chi2-u7 po2-tiong7 nng7 ji7, in-ui7 goa2 liau2-kai2 kang2 lu2 choe7 oe7 lu2 siunn-si. ah! goa2 tui3 li2 e5 cheng5 goa2 eng7 heng5-tong7 lai5 piau2-si7, ah! gun2 tui3 li2 e5 ai3 siong-sin3 seng khou2 ji5-au7 tinn, hi-bong7 thinn lai5 po2-pi3, hi-bong7 li2 ai3 kian-chhi5, hou7 lan2 cha2 chit8 jit8 kat lian5-li2.
你講的笑話已經強欲笑未出來，今仔日的天氣是好天抑是風颱，我經過你的夢中，聽見你的心事，正手是感激，倒手是感慨。

li2 kang2 e5 chhio3-oe7 i2-keng kiong5 beh chhio3 boe7 chhut--lai5, kin-a2-jit8 e5 thinn-khi3 si7 ho2-thinn iah8 si7 hong-thai, goa2 keng-ke3 li2 e5 bang7-tiong, thiann-kinn3 li2 e5 sim-su7, chiann3-chhiu2 si7 kam2-kek, to3-chhiu2 si7 kam2-khai3.
這款的故事已經聽過幾落每，昨暝佇佗位也毋免講予我知，風吹過你的頭毛，吹出你的心事，正手是無情，倒手是無奈。

chit khoan2 e5 kou3-su7 i2-keng thiann koe3 kui2-loh8 pai2, cha-me5 ti7 to2-ui7 ia7 m7 bian2 kong2 hou7 goa2 chai, hong chhoe ke3 li2 e5 thau5-mng5, chhe chhut li2 e5 sim-su7, chiann3-chhiu2 si7 bo5 cheng5, to3-chhiu2 si7 bo5 nai7.
敢講你看袂出來？敢講你看袂出來？敢講你看袂出我已經為你放棄我的將來？心愛的你敢知我為你付出全部的愛？心愛的你敢知我為你付出全部的愛？

kam2 kong2 li2 khoann3 boe7 chhut--lai5? kam2 kong2 li2 khoann3 boe7 chhut--lai5? kam2 kong2 li2 khoann3 boe7 chhut goa2 i2-keng ui7 li2 hong3-khi3 goa2 e5 chiong-lai5? sim-ai3--e5 li2 kam2 chai goa2 ui7 li2 hu3-chhut choan5-pou7 e5 ai3? sim-ai3--e5 li2 kam2 chai goa2 ui7 li2 hu3-chhut choan5-pou7 e5 ai3?
這款的故事已經聽過幾落每，昨暝佇佗位也毋免講予我知，風吹過你的頭毛，吹出你的心事，正手是無情，倒手是無奈。

chit khoan2 e5 kou3-su7 i2-keng thiann koe3 kui2-loh8 pai2, cha-me5 ti7 to2-ui7 ia7 m7 bian2 kong2 hou7 goa2 chai, hong chhoe ke3 li2 e5 thau5-mng5, chhe chhut li2 e5 sim-su7, chiann3-chhiu2 si7 bo5 cheng5, to3-chhiu2 si7 bo5 nai7.
敢講你看袂出來？敢講你看袂出來？敢講你看袂出我已經為你放棄我的將來？心愛的你敢知我為你付出全部的愛？心愛的你敢知我為你付出全部的愛？

kam2 kong2 li2 khoann3 boe7 chhut--lai5? kam2 kong2 li2 khoann3 boe7 chhut--lai5? kam2 kong2 li2 khoann3 boe7 chhut goa2 i2-keng ui7 li2 hong3-khi3 goa2 e5 chiong-lai5? sim-ai3--e5 li2 kam2 chai goa2 ui7 li2 hu3-chhut choan5-pou7 e5 ai3? sim-ai3--e5 li2 kam2 chai goa2 ui7 li2 hu3-chhut choan5-pou7 e5 ai3?
我對你真心對待，你對我再三誤解，滿腹的委屈啥人知？聲聲的無奈誰了解？啊！為你受風為你受雨甘願來忍耐，啊！為你付出為你犧牲癡情無亂來。心愛的你敢知？心愛的你敢知？你全無對我關懷，閣再三對我誤解，有一日後悔你會知。

goa2 tui3 li2 chin-sim tui3-thai7, li2 tui3 goa2 chai3-sann gou7-kai2, moa2-pak e5 ui2-khut siann2-lang5 chai? siann-siann e5 bo5 nai7  siang2 liau2-kai2? ah! ui7 li2 siu7 hong ui7 li2 siu7 hou7 kam-goan7 lai5 jim2-nai7, ah! ui7 li2 hu3-chhut ui7 li2 hi-seng chhi-cheng5 bo5 loan7-lai5. sim-ai3--e5 li2 kam2 chai? sim-ai3--e5 li2 kam2 chai? li2 choan5 bo5 tui3 goa2 koan-hoai5, koh chai3-sann tui3 goa2 gou7-kai2, u7 chit8 jit8 hio7-hoe2 li2 e7 chai.
我對你真心對待，你對我再三誤解，滿腹的委屈啥人知？聲聲的無奈誰了解？啊！為你受風為你受雨甘願來忍耐，啊！為你付出為你犧牲癡情無亂來。心愛的你敢知？心愛的你敢知？你全無對我關懷，閣再三對我誤解，有一日後悔你會知。

goa2 tui3 li2 chin-sim tui3-thai7, li2 tui3 goa2 chai3-sann gou7-kai2, moa2-pak e5 ui2-khut siann2-lang5 chai? siann-siann e5 bo5 nai7  siang2 liau2-kai2? ah! ui7 li2 siu7 hong ui7 li2 siu7 hou7 kam-goan7 lai5 jim2-nai7, ah! ui7 li2 hu3-chhut ui7 li2 hi-seng chhi-cheng5 bo5 loan7-lai5. sim-ai3--e5 li2 kam2 chai? sim-ai3--e5 li2 kam2 chai? li2 choan5 bo5 tui3 goa2 koan-hoai5, koh chai3-sann tui3 goa2 gou7-kai2, u7 chit8 jit8 hio7-hoe2 li2 e7 chai.
啊！為你受風為你受雨甘願來忍耐，啊！為你付出為你犧牲癡情無亂來。心愛的你敢知？心愛的你敢知？你全無對我關懷，閣再三對我誤解，有一日後悔你會知。

ah! ui7 li2 siu7 hong ui7 li2 siu7 hou7 kam-goan7 lai5 jim2-nai7, ah! ui7 li2 hu3-chhut ui7 li2 hi-seng chhi-cheng5 bo5 loan7-lai5. sim-ai3--e5 li2 kam2 chai? sim-ai3--e5 li2 kam2 chai? li2 choan5 bo5 tui3 goa2 koan-hoai5, koh chai3-sann tui3 goa2 gou7-kai2, u7 chit8 jit8 hio7-hoe2 li2 e7 chai.
咱的過去敢是捌做伙，所以今世閣再來相尋。問你問我問天也問地，敢會記咱所講的話？茫茫渺渺人生的一切，只有行過滄桑才知影體會，真真假假冷暖的社會，只有對你的愛毋是假，若是有來世，緣份閣再追，永遠永遠無後悔。

lan2 e5 koe3-khi3 kann2 si7 pat cho3-hoe2, sou2-i2 kim-se3 koh chai3 lai5 sio chhoe7. mng7 li2 mng7 goa2 mng7 thinn ia7 mng7 te7, kam2 e7 ki3 lan2 sou2 kong2 e5 oe7? bong5-bong5-biau2-biau2 jin5-seng e5 it-chhe3, chi2-u7 kiann5 koe3 chhong-song chiah chai-iann2 the2-hoe7, chin-chin-ke2-ke2 leng2-loan2 e5 sia7-hoe7, chi2-u7 tui3 li2 e5 ai3 m7 si7 ke2, na7 si7 u7 lai5-se3, ian5-hun7 koh chai3 tui, eng2-oan2-eng2-oan2 bo5 hio7-hoe2.
咱的過去敢是捌做伙，所以今世閣再來相尋。問你問我問天也問地，敢會記咱所講的話？茫茫渺渺人生的一切，只有行過滄桑才知影體會，真真假假冷暖的社會，只有對你的愛毋是假，若是有來世，緣份閣再追，永遠永遠無後悔。

lan2 e5 koe3-khi3 kann2 si7 pat cho3-hoe2, sou2-i2 kim-se3 koh chai3 lai5 sio chhoe7. mng7 li2 mng7 goa2 mng7 thinn ia7 mng7 te7, kam2 e7 ki3 lan2 sou2 kong2 e5 oe7? bong5-bong5-biau2-biau2 jin5-seng e5 it-chhe3, chi2-u7 kiann5 koe3 chhong-song chiah chai-iann2 the2-hoe7, chin-chin-ke2-ke2 leng2-loan2 e5 sia7-hoe7, chi2-u7 tui3 li2 e5 ai3 m7 si7 ke2, na7 si7 u7 lai5-se3, ian5-hun7 koh chai3 tui, eng2-oan2-eng2-oan2 bo5 hio7-hoe2.
茫茫渺渺人生的一切，只有行過滄桑才知影體會，真真假假冷暖的社會，只有對你的愛毋是假，若是有來世，緣份閣再追，永遠永遠無後悔。

bong5-bong5-biau2-biau2 jin5-seng e5 it-chhe3, chi2-u7 kiann5 koe3 chhong-song chiah chai-iann2 the2-hoe7, chin-chin-ke2-ke2 leng2-loan2 e5 sia7-hoe7, chi2-u7 tui3 li2 e5 ai3 m7 si7 ke2, na7 si7 u7 lai5-se3, ian5-hun7 koh chai3 tui, eng2-oan2-eng2-oan2 bo5 hio7-hoe2.
毋知火車何時開，兩人雙手放未離。看你目箍紅吱吱，心肝親像針底威。茫茫月台邊，惜別心愛的你，茫茫月台邊，傷心珠淚滴。

m7 chai hoe2-chhia ho5-si5 khui, nng7 lang5 siang-chhiu2 pang3 be7 li7. khoann3 li2 bak8-khou ang5-ki-ki, sim-koann chhin-chhiunn7 chiam teh ui. bong5-bong5 goeh8-tai5 pinn, sioh-piat8 sim-ai3 e5 li2, bong5-bong5 goeh8-tai5 pinn, siong-sim chu-lui7 tih.
毋知火車已經開，毋知何時再相見，想欲大聲來叫你，火車已經出城市。
m7 chai hoe2-chhia i2-keng khui, m7 chai ho5-si5 chai3 sio-kinn3, siunn7 beh toa7-siann lai5 kio3 li2, hoe2-chhia i2-keng chhut siann5-chhi7.
寶島舊府城，懷念阮的鄉里。自從離開來到異鄉已經過數年。阮想起細漢彼時，故鄉的代誌，惜別彼時唱著彼條山明水清的歌詩，你看覓請你看覓阮的故鄉真正美麗。

po2-to2 ku7 hu2-siann5, hoai5-liam7 goan2 e5 hiong-li2. chu7-chiong5 li7-khui lai5 kau3 i7-hiong i2-keng ke3 sou3 ni5. goan2 siunn7-khi2 se3-han3 hit si5, kou3-hiong e5 tai7-chi3, sioh-piat8 hit si5 chhiunn3 tioh8 hit tiau5 san beng5 chui2 chheng e5 koa-si, li2 khoann3-mai7 chhiann2 li2 khoann3-mai7 goan2 e5 kou3-hiong chin-chiann3 bi2-le7.
黃昏景色水鴨雙雙，像桃源仙景，月娘光夜暝，逐家都來海邊，唱歌跳舞歡歡喜喜，袂記夜深更。想彼時人人講阮會唱佮會跳，阮也唱著舊城南都山明水清的歌詩，你看覓請你看覓阮的故鄉真正美麗。

hong5-hun keng2-sek chui2-ah siang-siang, chhiunn7 tho5-goan5 sian-keng2, goeh8-niu5 kong ia7-mi5, tak8-ke to lai5 hai2-pinn, chhiunn3-koa thiau3-bu2 hoann-hoann-hi2-hi2, be7 ki3 ia7 chhim-kinn. siunn7 hit si5 lang5-lang5 kong2 gun2 e7 chhiunn3 kah e7 thiau3, gun2 ia7 chhiunn3 tioh8 ku7-siann5 lam5-to san beng5 chui2 chheng e5 koa-si, li2 khoann3-mai7 chhiann2 li2 khoann3-mai7 goan2 e5 kou3-hiong chin-chiann3 bi2-le7.
月夜海景寶島聞名，故鄉的海邊，今日阮收著爸爸寄來批信，講伊掠著大批烏魚，好運得財利，真歡喜予阮一時，爽快有元氣，阮也唱著舊城南都山明水清的歌詩，你看覓請你看覓阮的故鄉真正美麗。

goeh8-ia7 hai2-keng2 po2-to2 bun5-beng5, kou3-hiong e5 hai2-pinn, kim-jit8 goan2 siu tioh8 pa-pa7 kia3 lai5 phoe-sin3, kong2 i liah8 tioh8 toa7-phoe ou-hi5, ho2 un7 tit chai5-li7, chin hoann-hi2 hou7 gun2 chit8-si5, song2-khoai3 u7 goan5-khi3, gun2 ia7 chhiunn3 tioh8 ku7-siann5 lam5-to san beng5 chui2 chheng e5 koa-si, li2 khoann3-mai7 chhiann2 li2 khoann3-mai7 goan2 e5 kou3-hiong chin-chiann3 bi2-le7.
大魚小魚游來游去，阮的故鄉南都，山明水清山明水清。
toa7 hi5 sio2 hi5 iu5 lai5 iu5 khi3, goan2 e5 kou3-hiong lam5-to, san beng5 chui2 chheng soann beng5 chui2 chheng.
收著船的錠，船欲開船欲離開，戀戀不捨的港口再會啦，半年若過去才閣來相會，請你快樂來等候相會時。船欲開船欲離開，再會呀港都。

Siu tioh8 chun5 e5 tiann3, chun5 beh khui-chun5 beh li7-khui, loan5-loan5 put sia2 e5 kang2-khau2 chai3-hoe7 lah, poann3 ni5 na7 koe3-khi3 chiah koh lai5 siong-hoe7, chhiann2 li2 khoai3-lok8 lai5 tan2-hau7 siong-hoe7 si5. chun5 beh khui chun5 beh li7-khui, chai3-hoe7 ia kang2-tou.
雖然裝笑容，心內苦著惜別離，你無定怨嘆像渡鳥的人，立誓佇海面始終的性命，一時來別離怎樣會傷悲？船欲開船欲離開，再會呀港都。

sui-jian5 chng chhio3-iong5, sim-lai7 khou2 tioh8 sioh piat8-li7, li2 bo5-tiann7 oan3-than3 chhiunn7 tou7-chiau2 e5 lang5, lip8-se3 ti7 hai2-bin7 si2 chiong e5 sinn3-mia7, chit8-si5 lai5 piat8-li7 chainn2-iunn7 e7 siong-pi? chun5 beh khui chun5 beh li7-khui, chai3-hoe7 ia kang2-tou.
離別了後時，一定寄批來予你，船若時去到位，相片也寄去。可愛的街市再會啦再會，請你保重來等候相會時。船欲開船欲離開，再會呀港都。

li7-piat8 liau2 au7-si5, it-teng7 kia3 phoe lai5 hou7 li2, chun5 na7 si5 khi3 kau3 ui7, siong3-phinn3 ia7 kia3 khi3. kho2-ai3 e5 koe-chhi7 chai3-hoe7 lah chai3-hoe7, chhiann2 li2 po2-tiong7 lai5 tan2-hau7 siong-hoe7 si5. chun5 beh khui chun5 beh li7-khui, chai3-hoe7 ia kang2-tou.
再會啦，今夜來分開。再會啦，再會已經講出喙。人生的悲歡離合，由在天的意，聲聲再會啦，再會啦，夢中見。

chai3-hoe7 lah, kim-ia7 lai5 hun-khui. chai3-hoe7 lah, chai3-hoe7 i2-keng kong2 chhut chhui3. jin5-seng e5 pi-hoan-li7-hap8, iu5-chai7 thian e5 i3, siann-siann chai3-hoe7 lah, chai3-hoe7 lah, bang7-tiong kinn3.
車窗外阮心愛的人目屎滴，看在阮的眼中疼佇阮的心。心愛的，你著做你去，千萬毋通為阮耽誤了前程。

chhia-thang goa7 goan2 sim-ai3 e5 lang5 bak8-sai2 tih, khoann3 chai7 goan2 e5 gan2-tiong thiann3 ti7 gun2 e5 sim. sim-ai3--e5, li2 tioh8 choe3 li2 khi3, chhian-ban7 m7 thang ui7 goan2 tam-gou7 liau2 chian5-theng5.
毋願來做一个自私的男性，辜負你的青春來等待。心愛的，只要你心堅定，我的愛，時間去證明。
m7 goan7 lai5 choe3 chit8 e5 chu7-su e5 lam5-seng3, kou-hu7 li2 e5 chheng-chhun lai5 tan2-thai7. sim-ai3--e5, chi2-iau3 li2 sim kian-teng7, goa2 e5 ai3, si5-kan khi3 cheng3-beng5.
五彩霓虹閃閃熾爍，繁華夜都市無人看出來阮的稀微，愛也愛過，恨也恨過，傷心無啥貨。毋知醉的滋味，予阮心碎的是珠淚，看著別人的戀情，總是糖甘蜜甜。

ngou2-chhai2 ge5 kheng7 sih-sih-sih-siok, hoan5-hoa5 ia7 tou-chhi7 bo5 lang5 khoann3--chhut-lai5 goan2 e5 hi-bi5, ai3 a2 ai3 ke3, hun7 a7 hun7--koe3, siong-sim bo5 siann2-hoe3. m7 chai chui3 e5 chu-bi7, hou7 gun2 sim-chhui3 e5 si7 chu-lui7, khoann3 tioh8 pat8-lang5 e5 loan5-cheng5, chong2-si7 thng5-kam bit8 tinn.
我愛的人愛別人，將阮來放。再會啦無緣的繁華都巿，愈蹛是愈傷心，愛人變了心，甘願予伊去，再會啦無緣的繁華都巿，今暗欲離開，心茫茫，也毋知欲對佗位去。

goa2 ai3 e5 lang5 ai3 pat8-lang5, chiong goan2 lai5 pang3. chai3-hoe7-lah bo5-ian5 e5 hoan5-hoa5 tou-chhi7, lu2 toa3 si7 lu2 siong-sim, ai3-jin5 pian3 liau2 sim, kam-goan7 hou7 i khi3, chai3-hoe7-lah bo5-ian5 e5 hoan5-hoa5 tou-chhi7, kim-am3 beh li7-khui, sim-bang5-bang5, ia7 m7 chai beh tui3 to2-ui7 khi3.
春雨像彼齣過去的夢，有心人故意予淋。已經毋願閣再等待，傷心人無目屎。總是阮多情啦！即爾軟心肝，這無奈的感情才會無來無煞。到今算來十外冬，等待花蕊也無紅，原諒多情的我，愈想愈無願。

chhun-hou7 chhiunn7 hit chhut koe3-khi3 e5 bang7, iu2-sim-lang5 kou3-i3 hou7 lam5. i2-keng m7 goan7 koh chai3 tan2-thai7, siong-sim lang5 bo5 bak8-sai2. chong2-si7 gun2 to-cheng5--lah! chiah-nih nng2 sim-koann, che bo5 nai7 e5 kam2-cheng5 chiah e7 bo5 lai5 bo5 soah. kau3 tann sng3 lai5 chap8 goa7 tang, tan2-thai7 hoe-lui2 ia7 bo5 ang5, goan5-liong7 to-cheng5 e5 goa2, lu2 siunn7 lu2 bo5 goan7.
再會啦！心愛的無緣的人！若無愛石頭也無採工！過去像一齣戇人的故事，無聊的夢，再會啦！心愛的無緣的人！六月的茉莉赫爾仔芳，祝福你親像春天的花蕊赫爾的紅。

chai3-hoe7-lah! sim-ai3 e5 bo5-ian5 e5 lang5! na7 bo5 ai3 chioh8-thau5 ia7 bo5-chhai2 kong! koe3-khi3 chhiunn7 chit8 chhut gong7-lang5 e5 kou3-su7, bo5-liau5 e5 bang7, chai3-hoe7-lah! sim-ai3 e5 bo5-ian5 e5 lang5! lak8--goeh8 e5 bak8-ni7 hiah-nih-a2 phang, chiok-hok li2 chhin-chhiunn7 chhun-thinn e5 hoe-lui2 hiah-nih e5 ang5.
秋天的黃昏日頭落山，有心人金金共看，若是伊對阮攏無愛，傷心人無目屎。總是阮多情啦！赫爾軟心肝，這無奈的感情才會無來無煞！

chhiu-thinn e5 hong5-hun jit8-thau5 loh8-soann, u7-sim-lang5 kim-kim ka7 khoann3, na7 si7 i tui3 gun2 long2 bo5-ai3, siong-sim-lang5 bo5 bak8-sai2. chong2-si7 gun2 to-cheng5--lah! hiah-nih nng2 sim-koann, chit bo5 nai7 e5 kam2-cheng5 chiah e7 bo5 lai5 bo5 soah!
資料.篇名: 再會啦心愛的無緣的人
